Articles.Content: Hi. My name is Kelly. I'm from San Diego. I'm a new member of this community and just wanted to say hello to all of you.
Welcome, Kelly. Have you been playing long?

Hello, kellyscott!

Welcome to the KSP forums!

If you need help with anything, be sure to ask. There will be someone who knows the answer!
Welcome to the forums. If you need any help just ask, unfortunatly if its about going any further than Minmus I can't help.
hello me Mehak. How are you friends.
Hello to Kelly and all other forums members. I am also new here so hope we all enjoy the chit chats.
